member.name: M:Avanteam.Directory.Snapshots.Repository.DirectoryResourceSnapshotsRepository.#ctor(System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The collection of connection strings in which we should look for the desired one. By default (if null) it use the one from the default configuration (app.config / web.config).
The name of the connection string to use. "Avanteam.Settings.APSApplication" by default.
